subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Milan Michalek, Mike Fisher and Daniel Alfredsson each had a goal and an assist to lead the Ottawa Senators to a 5-3 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers on Thursday night.
snippet: Milan Michalek, Mike Fisher and Daniel Alfredsson each had a goal and an assist to lead the Ottawa Senators to a 5-3 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers on Thursday night.
